review: I love it!  Works great!! The voice Search button makes things so much easier.  The only thing I don't like is when I do the VS it only searches Amazon Prime and the paid tv/movies.  I thought it was supposed to bring up stuff that is available on Netflix as well.  That being said.  I have enjoyed this so much. I bought the game controller and love that as well.  It's perfect for a small time gamer like myself.  It's like having a mini game machine without having to spend hundreds of dollars on a Ps4,Xbox etc and games.  The games are fun.  Mostly mini games and classic sega games (which I love) that are either free or really cheap.  I got Castle of Illusion starring Mickey for just 79 cents!  I'd definitely recommend getting this system!!

review: Because my TV is routed through an A/V receiver the Fire Stick would not have worked ( would not have had sound). I would not have known that had a kind reviewer not answered my question about it before I bought it. With his advice I bought the Fire TV instead because it has an optical audio output. I also bought an optical audio cable.  I plugged an HDMI cable from the FireTV into my TV, and the Optical Audio cable from the Fire TV box into an available optical audio input on my A/V receiver.Use my A/V remote to switch the TV input to the proper input and push the button for my audio input and I was up and running. Operation is very easy. Voice activation works great. I only have 1.5 mbps internet speed so I do not get HD quality picture and sometimes it will pause while buffering but other than that I am very satisfied.
